name: 曾世杰
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule: 1.Measuring 2.Straight Line Motion, Vectors 3. Vectors, Two- and- Three-Dimensional Motion 4.Newton's Law of Motion 5.Friction,Drag and Centripetal Motion 6.Work-Kinetic Energy Theorem 7. Conservation of Energy 8.Center of Mass and Momentum 9. Rotational Motion I 10.Rotational Motiom II 11.Equilibrium, Indeterminate Structures 12.Newtonian Gravitation 13.Fluid Statics and Dynamics  14.Simple Harmonic Motion 15.Transverse Waves 16.Longitudinal Wavess
